attributes.action: allow the Red Arrows to perform at the opening to the London 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The organisers have banned them as they are 'too militaristically British' according to the Department of Culture, Media and Sport. LET THEM FLY!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
